item.title: Raphire /Win11Debloat | PowerShell | 35,754
item.description: A simple, lightweight PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps, disable telemetry, as well as perform various other changes to customize, declutter and improve your Windows experience. Win11Debloat works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

item.title: thedotmack /claude-mem | TypeScript | 7,426
